name: Super Car City Driving Sim
description:
Super Car City Driving Sim 3D is a physics based driving game. If you like Simulator Games, Racing around an empty open world city, Drifting cars and Crashing into everything.... and instantly fixing your car again then you'll love the experience Super Car City Driving Sim 3D has to offer.

The car has Smooth, tight steering, realistic car physics and sounds. You need to break in order to drift your car around corners....
.

*** KEY FEATURES ***
* Simple Steering
* Realistic Driving Experience and Sounds
* Realistic Graphics
* Realistic physics
* Works in tablets and in full High Quality HD Graphics.
* Under 50mb so you can download without wifi.
